trans-unit.source: Provides <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> objects for the plus sign (+) and minus sign (-) buttons of a tree view control.

The properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TreeView.Glyph> class get a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for the plus sign and minus sign buttons that display next to a tree view node that contains child elements.
Gets a visual style element that represents a minus sign (-) button of a tree view node.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TreeView.Glyph.Closed%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a minus sign button of a tree view node.
Gets a visual style element that represents a plus sign (+) button of a tree view node.

You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TreeView.Glyph.Opened%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement"></xref> that represents a plus sign button of a tree view node.
